events.message: We have successfully received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position.
The candidate's application has been categorized under the engineering department as a software engineer role.
A recruiter specialized in technical roles has been assigned to handle this engineering candidate's process.
The candidate completed the initial screening interview, showing strong knowledge of software development concepts.
The candidate responded promptly to the scheduling request, confirming availability for the technical interview.
We have scheduled the technical interview with the candidate for the upcoming Thursday at 2 PM UTC.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating excellent problem-solving skills.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidate's fit with company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went smoothly; the candidate expressed a strong interest in joining our engineering team.
A formal offer has been proposed to the candidate, outlining the compensation and role expectations.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed excitement about the potential opportunity.
The candidate has accepted the job offer and is ready to begin the onboarding process with our engineering team.
The candidate has officially started onboarding, completing initial paperwork and systems access setup.
The hiring process for the software engineer position has been successfully completed with the candidate onboarded.
